dialogue.text: Hi! Are you ready to check out?
dialogue.en: Hi! Are you ready to check out?
dialogue.ja: こんにちは。お会計ですか？

dialogue.text: Do you have a membership card or phone number?
dialogue.en: Do you have a membership card or phone number?
dialogue.zh: 你有會員卡或會員電話嗎？
dialogue.ja: 会員カードか電話番号はありますか？

dialogue.text: You can enter your phone number on the keypad here.
dialogue.en: You can enter your phone number on the keypad here.
dialogue.zh: 你可以在這裡的鍵盤輸入電話。
dialogue.ja: こちらのキーで電話番号を入力してください。

dialogue.text: Would you like a receipt—printed or digital?
dialogue.en: Would you like a receipt—printed or digital?
dialogue.zh: 需要收據嗎？紙本還是電子？
dialogue.ja: レシートは必要ですか？紙か電子か。

dialogue.text: How would you like to pay—cash, card, or mobile pay?
dialogue.en: How would you like to pay—cash, card, or mobile pay?
dialogue.zh: 你要用現金、刷卡、還是行動支付？
dialogue.ja: お支払いは現金・カード・モバイル決済のどれにしますか？

dialogue.text: Please insert or tap your card when you’re ready.
dialogue.en: Please insert or tap your card when you’re ready.
dialogue.zh: 準備好時請插卡或感應。
dialogue.ja: 準備できたらカードを差し込むかタッチしてください。

dialogue.text: Do you want to use any coupons today?
dialogue.en: Do you want to use any coupons today?
dialogue.ja: クーポンは使いますか？

dialogue.text: This coupon will apply automatically after scanning.
dialogue.en: This coupon will apply automatically after scanning.
dialogue.zh: 這張券掃完會自動折抵。
dialogue.ja: このクーポンはスキャン後に自動適用されます。

dialogue.text: Would you like to donate your change to charity?
dialogue.en: Would you like to donate your change to charity?
dialogue.ja: おつりを寄付しますか？

dialogue.text: Do you need a bag? It’s $0.10 each.
dialogue.en: Do you need a bag? It’s $0.10 each.
dialogue.ja: 袋は要りますか？1枚0.10です。

dialogue.text: Would you like help packing your groceries?
dialogue.en: Would you like help packing your groceries?
dialogue.ja: 袋詰めをお手伝いしましょうか？

dialogue.text: Your points have been added to your account.
dialogue.en: Your points have been added to your account.
dialogue.zh: 點數已經累積到你的帳戶。
dialogue.ja: ポイントを会員アカウントに加算しました。
ありがとうございます。良い一日を。
